name: Kumquat and Fennel Smash From Craft
description: When we mixed this up in the office, AHT editor and photographer extraordinaire Robyn Lee said: "What is that? That looks like a salad..." Appearances aside, it's delicious to drink (and chew.) Be sure to muddle well to make sure the fennel flavor translates into the drink.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: 1 kumquat, sliced in rounds, on a toothpick

recipeInstructions.text: Combine and muddle the 3 kumquats, the chopped fennel, lemon juice and agave nectar in a shaker.

Add orange juice and ice. Pour the entire contents of the shaker into a
large old-fashioned glass, top with the tonic water and garnish.
